title: [Large-scale] Analysis of Online Learning Dissatisfaction Factors and Improvement Plan Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and proficiency in educational technology tools
context.additional_context: Targeting science majors, this program emphasizes real-world problem-solving skills through project-based assessment. It analyzes online learning challenges and explores alternatives using mixed methodologies and user-centered design

learning_goals: Learners can classify and explain at least five major dissatisfaction factors in online learning
Learners can systematically propose online learning improvement strategies using mixed methodologies
Learners can develop online learning content prototypes for science disciplines following user-centered design principles
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
